channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Don’t expect mortgage rates to fall after the Fed’s interest-rate cuts. But here’s one move borrowers can make right now.
item.description: Mortgage rates aren’t likely to drop after the coming Federal Reserve meeting, when the central bank is expected to cut interest rates, economists say...

item.title: Consumer sentiment hits four-month low in September as lower- and middle-income Americans worry about jobs
item.description: Consumers were worried about rising risks to business conditions and labor markets, as well as increasing inflation.

item.title: Low-cost index funds are best for investors, right? Not so fast.
item.description: New ETF aims to beat the S&P 500 just by avoiding its obvious blunders

item.title: Is your retirement still decades away? How to take a ‘mini-retirement’ now — without quitting your job.
item.description: Don’t wait for the future to pursue your dreams, this author says.

item.title: Could Microsoft buy OpenAI? A new arrangement makes that possible — one day.
item.description: OpenAI’s transition to a profit-driven business model makes it a better candidate for an IPO or an acquisition.
